response.title: Follow-up case vet-alpha-20260212T115922Z
response.diagnosis: Mild soft-tissue strain in front right leg
response.prescription: Rest 5 days, meloxicam low dose once daily x3 days
response.vet_notes: No fracture signs. Recheck if limping persists >7 days.
